name: Lost Sector
description:
Lost Sector is a retro-inspired ARPG/platformer version of Warframe - made entirely by members of the Warframe community! 

Take control of Frost, the Warframe with a chilling arsenal of icy powers as, guided by the Lotus, he attempts to thwart the plans of a Corpus organisation, driven by their endless pursuit of profit!

Lost Sector is most definitely an alpha game, but as we lay down more and more of the foundation mechanics of the game, hopefully the rate at which new content is added will increase dramatically. And with your help via feedback, suggestions and bug reports, Lost Sector should turn out to be an amazing game in no time!

**NOTE** - We are not affiliated with Digital Extremes, the creators of Warframe. Warframe and the Warframe logo are registered trademarks of Digital Extremes Ltd. As per Warframe's Terms of Service/EULA, we (the creators of Lost Sector) will not profit from any donations - they will be used for project overheads (server costs etc.), giveaways, and other initiatives to improve the game
